title: Miners of Bolivia
creator_credit: Films Incorporated and Institut für Film und Bild
brief_description: A study of the work and submarginal living of tin-ore miners of Altiplano is presented against a background of the natural beauty of Bolivia. Shows effect of the terrain and climate on the Indians’ lives, and surveys the problems that have contributed to poverty in certain areas of the country.
